To infinity and BEYOND! Unlock Buzz Lightyear to gain access to our brand new AR character! (available for AR compatible devices).
With great power come great responsibility! Swing by and brush with our new AR character, your friendly neighborhood Spider-Man!

Some things never change, but your toothbrush isn’t one of them! Use Olaf, Anna and Elsa from Frozen 2 and go into the unknown with our new Disney Magic Timer saga map! Or bring our new AR character, Olaf into your home!
You got a friend in me! Grab your toothbrush and collect stickers from the beloved Pixar franchises - Monsters Inc, Finding Nemo and Toy Story!
